title: Plantation Land for sale near Ahangama, Galle
details: This relatively small mixed plantation is situated just 5km inland from Ahangama beach with beautiful views of rice paddy fields and jungle. The land itself consists of two acres of well maintained tea bushes, pepper vines, pineapple plants, cinnamon trees as well as numerous other crops. Ideal plot of land to build a villa of private residence as the area is enviably tranquil!
